post.summary: Authenticate by username, email, or user ID.
Reset password using a valid token.
Create a new user with optional role overrides.

patch.summary: Update user attributes such as profile, status, and credentials.

post.summary: Activate Google login for a user.

patch.summary: Update Google OAuth tokens for a user.

delete.summary: Deactivate Google login for a user.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Username, email, or user ID for the account.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the role within the system.

role_name.title: Role Name
role_name.description: Optional role override when creating privileged users.
